species.name: Human
species.description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races. Whatever drives them, humans are the innovators, the achievers, and the pioneers of the worlds.

species.name: Elf
species.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in places of ethereal beauty, in the midst of ancient forests or in silvery spires glittering with faerie light.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply for 4 hours a day. After resting this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

subraces.name: High Elf
subraces.description: As a high elf, you have a keen mind and a mastery of at least the basics of magic.

additionalTraits.name: Elf Weapon Training
additionalTraits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

additionalTraits.name: Cantrip
additionalTraits.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

additionalTraits.name: Extra Language
additionalTraits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

subraces.name: Wood Elf
subraces.description: As a wood elf, you have keen senses and intuition, and your fleet feet carry you quickly and stealthily through your native forests.

additionalTraits.name: Elf Weapon Training
additionalTraits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

additionalTraits.name: Fleet of Foot
additionalTraits.description: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

additionalTraits.name: Mask of the Wild
additionalTraits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

subraces.name: Dark Elf (Drow)
subraces.description: Descended from an earlier subrace of dark-skinned elves, the drow were banished from the surface world for following the goddess Lolth down the path to evil.

additionalTraits.name: Superior Darkvision
additionalTraits.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

additionalTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
additionalTraits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

additionalTraits.name: Drow Magic
additionalTraits.description: You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the faerie fire spell once. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

additionalTraits.name: Drow Weapon Training
additionalTraits.description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.

species.name: Dwarf
species.description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Combat Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

species.name: Halfling
species.description: The diminutive halflings survive in a world full of larger creatures by avoiding notice or, barring that, avoiding offense.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

traits.name: Naturally Stealthy
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

species.name: Dragonborn
species.description: Born of dragons, dragonborn walk proudly through a world that greets them with fearful incomprehension. Shaped by draconic gods or the dragons themselves, dragonborn originally hatched from dragon eggs.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

subraces.name: Black Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Acid damage, 5 by 30 ft. Line (Dex. save).

additionalTraits.name: Acid Breath
additionalTraits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), 1d10 acid damage.

subraces.name: Blue Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Lightning damage, 5 by 30 ft. Line (Dex. save).

additionalTraits.name: Lightning Breath
additionalTraits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), 1d10 lightning damage.

subraces.name: Brass Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Fire damage, 5 by 30 ft. Line (Dex. save).

additionalTraits.name: Fire Breath
additionalTraits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), 1d10 fire damage.

subraces.name: Bronze Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Lightning damage, 5 by 30 ft. Line (Dex. save).

additionalTraits.name: Lightning Breath
additionalTraits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), 1d10 lightning damage.

subraces.name: Copper Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Acid damage, 5 by 30 ft. Line (Dex. save).

additionalTraits.name: Acid Breath
additionalTraits.description: 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex. save), 1d10 acid damage.

subraces.name: Gold Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Fire damage, 15 ft. Cone (Dex. save).

additionalTraits.name: Fire Breath
additionalTraits.description: 15 ft. cone (Dex. save), 1d10 fire damage.

subraces.name: Green Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Poison damage, 15 ft. Cone (Con. save).

additionalTraits.name: Poison Breath
additionalTraits.description: 15 ft. cone (Con. save), 1d10 poison damage.

subraces.name: Red Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Fire damage, 15 ft. Cone (Dex. save).

additionalTraits.name: Fire Breath
additionalTraits.description: 15 ft. cone (Dex. save), 1d10 fire damage.

subraces.name: Silver Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Cold damage, 15 ft. Cone (Con. save).

additionalTraits.name: Cold Breath
additionalTraits.description: 15 ft. cone (Con. save), 1d10 cold damage.

subraces.name: White Dragonborn
subraces.description: Ancestry: Cold damage, 15 ft. Cone (Con. save).

additionalTraits.name: Cold Breath
additionalTraits.description: 15 ft. cone (Con. save), 1d10 cold damage.

species.name: Gnome
species.description: A gnome's energy and enthusiasm for living shines through every inch of his or her tiny body. Gnomes average slightly over 3 feet tall and weigh 40 to 45 pounds.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.description: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

subraces.name: Forest Gnome
subraces.description: Gnomish Lineage: You have a natural knack for illusion and inherent quickness and stealth.

additionalTraits.name: Gnomish Lineage (Forest)
additionalTraits.description: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. You can also cast Speak with Animals (targeting Small or smaller beasts) at will. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose when you select this species).

subraces.name: Rock Gnome
subraces.description: Gnomish Lineage: You have a natural inventiveness and hardiness beyond that of other gnomes.

additionalTraits.name: Gnomish Lineage (Rock)
additionalTraits.description: You know the Mending and Prestidigitation cantrips. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose when you select this species).

species.name: Tiefling
species.description: Tieflings are derived from human bloodlines, and in the broadest possible sense, they still look human. However, their infernal heritage has left a clear imprint on their appearance.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Thanks to your infernal heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Otherworldly Presence
traits.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

subraces.name: Abyssal Tiefling
subraces.description: Lineage linked to the Abyss. You have resistance to Poison damage. You know the Poison Spray cantrip. At 3rd level, you learn Ray of Sickness. At 5th level, you learn Hold Person.

additionalTraits.name: Abyssal Legacy
additionalTraits.description: You have resistance to Poison damage. You know spells.

subraces.name: Chthonic Tiefling
subraces.description: Lineage linked to Carceri or the Underworld. You have resistance to Necrotic damage. You know the Chill Touch cantrip. At 3rd level, you learn False Life. At 5th level, you learn Ray of Enfeeblement.

additionalTraits.name: Chthonic Legacy
additionalTraits.description: You have resistance to Necrotic damage. You know spells.

subraces.name: Infernal Tiefling
subraces.description: Lineage linked to the Nine Hells. You have resistance to Fire damage. You know the Fire Bolt cantrip. At 3rd level, you learn Hellish Rebuke. At 5th level, you learn Darkness.

additionalTraits.name: Infernal Legacy
additionalTraits.description: You have resistance to Fire damage. You know spells.

species.name: Aasimar
species.description: Aasimar are mortals who carry a spark of the Upper Planes within their souls. They can fan that spark to bring light, ease wounds, and unleash the fury of the heavens.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

traits.name: Healing Hands
traits.description: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of hit points equal to your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Light Bearer
traits.description: You know the Light cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Celestial Revelation
traits.description: At 3rd level, choose one revelation option (Necrotic Shroud, Radiant Consumption, or Radiant Soul). You can use it as a bonus action.

species.name: Goliath
species.description: Goliaths are distant descendants of giants. Each goliath bears the stamp of a specific kind of giant in their nature.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Mountain Born
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

subraces.name: Cloud Giant Ancestry
subraces.description: You trace your heritage to Cloud Giants, the high-flying tricksters of giantkind.

additionalTraits.name: Cloud Jaunt
additionalTraits.description: As a Bonus Action, you magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

subraces.name: Fire Giant Ancestry
subraces.description: You trace your heritage to Fire Giants, the master artisans and militarists of giantkind.

additionalTraits.name: Fire's Burn
additionalTraits.description: When you hit a target with an Attack Roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal 1d10 Fire damage to that target. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

subraces.name: Frost Giant Ancestry
subraces.description: You trace your heritage to Frost Giants, the mighty reavers of the frozen lands.

additionalTraits.name: Frost's Chill
additionalTraits.description: When you hit a target with an Attack Roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal 1d6 Cold damage and reduce the target's Speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

subraces.name: Hill Giant Ancestry
subraces.description: You trace your heritage to Hill Giants, the gluttonous scavengers of the hills.

additionalTraits.name: Hill's Tumble
additionalTraits.description: When you hit a Large or smaller creature with an Attack Roll and deal damage to it, you can knock the target Prone. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

subraces.name: Stone Giant Ancestry
subraces.description: You trace your heritage to Stone Giants, the reclusive seers and carvers of rock.

additionalTraits.name: Stone's Endurance
additionalTraits.description: When you take damage, you can use your Reaction to roll 1d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled and reduce the damage by that total. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

subraces.name: Storm Giant Ancestry
subraces.description: You trace your heritage to Storm Giants, the prophetic monarchs of giantkind.

additionalTraits.name: Storm's Thunder
additionalTraits.description: When you take damage from a creature within 60 feet of you, you can use your Reaction to deal 1d8 Thunder damage to that creature. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

species.name: Orc
species.description: Orcs are people who trace their origin to the one-eyed god Gruumsh. They are known for their tirelessness in battle and their devotion to their allies.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Adrenaline Rush
traits.description: You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action. When you do so, you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. You can't use this trait again until you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.
